params.asset: Token address the pool was initialized for.
Address to get a Teller Token for.

lendingPoolDeposit(address,uint256).details: the user must call ERC20.approve function previously.If the cToken is available (not 0x0), it deposits the lending asset amount into Compound directly.

params.amount: Amount of {asset} to deposit in the pool.
params.asset: Token address to deposit into the lending pool.

LendingPoolInitialized(address,address).notice: This event is emitted when a new lending pool is initialized.

getTTokenFor(address).notice: Get the Teller Token address for an underlying asset.

initLendingPool(address,address).notice: Initialized a new lending pool for {asset}

lendingPoolDeposit(address,uint256).notice: It allows users to deposit tokens into the pool.
